sentences.english: He’d fractured his rib and hip.
sentences.chinese: 他折斷了胸骨和髖關節。

sentences.english: The breastbone bold, without being unduly prominent.
sentences.chinese: 胸骨明顯，但沒有誇張的突出。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the skin incision of the median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索胸骨正中劈開徑路理想的皮膚切口。

sentences.english: Firm the shoulder blades against the back, and move the sternum toward the chin.
sentences.chinese: 固定肩胛骨進入背部，移動胸骨向下巴的方向。

sentences.english: Sternum small and ginkgo leaf-shaped with low keel.
sentences.chinese: 胸骨小呈銀杏葉片狀，具低的龍骨突。

sentences.english: Press the skin of your back in toward your sternum to assist these actions.
sentences.chinese: 壓你後背的皮膚向胸骨的方向輔助這些動作。

sentences.english: Draw the skin overlying your front ribs away from your sternum.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔的皮膚擴張遠離胸骨。

sentences.english: The chest pain was described as sharp, retrosternal in location, and radiating to the back.
sentences.chinese: 胸痛爲侷限於胸骨後的銳痛，放射至背部。

sentences.english: There was no recurrence of sternal osteomyelitis during the follow-up periods.
sentences.chinese: 在追蹤期間並無胸骨骨髓炎的復發。

sentences.english: Then, the sternal wound was reconstructed with pectoralis major muscle flaps.
sentences.chinese: 然後，以胸大肌辮重建胸骨傷口。

sentences.english: The length of incision was about 60% of routine median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 切口長度約爲常規胸骨正中切口的60%。

sentences.english: Inhale and lift through the top of the sternum to lengthen the front torso.
sentences.chinese: 吸氣並提拉你的胸骨的上部來伸展前側軀幹。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and operation of substernal goiter .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胸骨後甲狀腺腫的診斷和手術方式。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize experiences of surgical treatment of sternal fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結分析胸骨骨折的外科處理方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the diagnosis and surgical treatment of substernal goiter(SG).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胸骨後甲狀腺腫瘤的診斷及手術方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method and curative effect of sternal suspensory traction on the patients with pectus excavatum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胸骨吊牽術治療小兒漏斗胸的方法和療效。
